name: 梁又文
objective:
本課程將專注於創新產品與混合實境的設計研究方法，期望透過虛實整合與使用者經驗的核心概念，應用研究方法深入探究設計問題與使用者經驗中的痛點，探討實體端產品設計和虛擬端的服務設計之各種可能性與創新概念整合，進而透過設計方法與軟硬體技術落實創新概念，最終達到設計出符合與滿足使用者在未來生活中的各種設計服務與體驗。
This course will focus on the design research methods of innovative products and mixed reality. It is expected that through the core concepts of virtual-real integration and user experience, it will apply research methods to deeply explore design problems and pain points in user experience and explore physical product design and virtual reality. We will integrate various possibilities of service design with innovative concepts. Then, we intend to utilize the implemented innovative concept by design methods, software, and hardware technologies to achieve the design services and experiences that meet and satisfy users in future life.
